articles.title: Murdoch family resolves dispute over ownership in multibillion-dollar deal - The Washington Post
articles.description: Rupert Murdoch and his son Lachlan reached a $3.3 billion settlement with Murdoch’s three older children, giving Lachlan control of the media empire after his father’s death.

articles.title: Judge skewers $1.5B Anthropic settlement with authors in pirated books case over AI training - AP News
articles.description: A federal judge on Monday skewered a $1.5 billion settlement between artificial intelligence company Anthropic and authors who allege nearly half million books had been illegally pirated to train chatbots, raising the specter that the case could still end up …

articles.title: Anglo American Near Deal to Acquire Teck Resources - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Anglo American Plc is nearing a deal to acquire Canada’s Teck Resources Ltd. in what could be the biggest mining deal in more than a decade — and just over a year since Anglo was subject to a takeover bid itself.

articles.title: Ferrari chair John Elkann to do community service over tax case - BBC
articles.description: John Elkann and two of his siblings will pay €183m to settle an Italian inheritance tax dispute.

articles.title: Stock futures are little changed after Nasdaq hits new record: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Wall Street is coming off a winning session, thanks to an advance in key chip stocks.

articles.title: Sam Altman Is Selling His Most Valuable Known Property - Forbes
articles.description: The listing comes as OpenAI gears up for an astronomical employee share sale that could make many in OpenAI’s ranks rich enough to afford the mansion.

articles.title: DoorDash CEO Tony Xu says path to autonomous deliveries filled with 'lots of pain and suffering' but company is nearing first inning of commercial progress - Fortune
articles.description: DoorDash has been working on autonomy and robotics technology since about 2017. It's currently doing drone deliveries in Australia and securing permits for the U.S.

articles.title: $1 million Powerball ticket purchased in Colorado Springs - KKTV
articles.description: While no one in Colorado won this weekend’s jackpot, one ticket purchased in Colorado Springs won a player $1 million in Saturday’s Powerball drawing!

articles.title: Lumber Prices Are Flashing a Warning Sign for the U.S. Economy - The Wall Street Journal
Major jobs revision Tuesday could show the labor market is weaker than previously thought - CBS News
articles.description: Economists expect the Bureau of Labor Statistics to revise its jobs data downward for the year ended in March 2025. Here's why.

articles.title: AppLovin, Robinhood, Broadcom, Tesla, EchoStar, Planet Labs, QuantumScape, and More Movers - Barron's
Intel Announces Key Leadership Appointments to Accelerate Innovation and Strengthen Execution - intc.com
RFK Jr.'s planned report linking Tylenol to autism crashes shares of parent company Kenvue - Fortune
articles.description: RFK Jr. is preparing a report that will allegedly claim a link between prenatal Tylenol (acetaminophen) use and autism.

articles.title: Tesla EV Sales Are Struggling But Elon Musk Looks To The Future For Value - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Tesla market share in the U.S. has fallen to its lowest level in nearly eight years.

articles.title: Salmonella outbreak linked to home delivery meals sickens over a dozen people - Scripps News
articles.description: A Salmonella outbreak has been linked to home delivery meals made by Metabolic Meals, prompting health officials to warn customers to check their refrigerators and freezers.

articles.title: Anduril Awarded Contract to Redefine the Future of Mixed Reality - Anduril
articles.description: Anduril Industries announced today that it has been awarded a $159 million contract by the U.S. Army for an initial prototyping period to develop a night vision and mixed reality system as part of the Soldier Borne Mission Command (formerly IVAS Next) program.
